title: Flag of Kosovo
cardDescription: The flag of the Republic of Kosovo was adopted immediately following the declaration of independence from Serbia on 17 February 2008.
description: The flag of the Republic of Kosovo was adopted immediately following the declaration of independence from Serbia on 17 February 2008. The flag is blue field charged with a map of Kosovo in gold, surmounted by an arc of six, white five-pointed stars, in the center. The stars are officially meant to symbolize Kosovoâ€™s six major ethnic groups: Albanians, Serbs, Turks, Gorani, Romani and Bosniaks.

Finished size:

14cm x 10cm
3,5 mm

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 28, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 27, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sab, sba, sc 2, sab, sba, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sba, [sab, sc 2, sba] x 2, sab, sba, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sba, sab, sc 2, sba, sab, sba, sc 2, sab, sba, sab, sc 2, sba, sab, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sab, sba, sc 3, sac, sca, sc 3, sab, sba, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 5, sac, sc 3, sca, sc 4, sab, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sac, sc 5, sca, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sac, sc sc 9, sca, sc 7, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sac, sc 10, sca, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sac, sc 10, sca, sc 8, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sac, sc 8, sca, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sac, sc 6, sca, sc 10, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sac, sc 2, sca, sac, sca, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 13, sac, sc 1, sca, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sac, sca, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 27, turn
Ch 1, sc 27, turn
